questions.question: Every day Jason ______________ (play) football with his friends.
I see you ___________________ (have) a new mobile phone.
Aya ______________ classical music to jazz and pop.
The Browns ______________ of going to the theatre tonight.
He painted the Mona Lisa.
He invented the telephone.
Where _____________________ (you/spend) your summer holidays?
I haven’t seen Sarah__________ 2007.
What has legs but cannot walk?
This apple pie _______________ delicious!
Tommy usually ________________ his homework after lunch.
He always / has / to travel abroad / wanted
options: He always has to travel abroad.
He has always to travel abroad wanted.
+He has always wanted to travel abroad.
He has wanted always to travel abroad.

questions.question: red/plastic/huge shoes
a(n) modern / luxurious I Italian car
goes to work / by bus / never / Diego
options: Diego goes never to work by bus.
Diego never goes by bus to work.
Diego goes to work by bus never.
+Diego never goes to work by bus.

questions.question: You’ll find me in Mercury, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, and Uranus. But never Neptune, or Venus. What am I?
I have lakes without water. Mountains without stone. And cities without buildings. What am I?
Steve’s voice is _______________  than Tim’s.
The cheetah is _____________________ animal in the world.
It’s  _______________  house I have ever seen.
They are _____________ people I have ever met.
What has hands but can’t clap?
This is the hottest season.
This is when it rains too much, and there’s water in the streets and buildings.
A _________ helps us see at night.
We can sleep in a _____________ when we don’t have a bed.
I’m tall when I’m young and I’m short when I’m old. What am I?
